name: AVO - Heritage - Short Corona
additionalNotes: Avo Heritage is handmade in the Dominican Republic in the Davidoff factory. A unique Ecuador Habano wrapper marries an eventful and complex blend of Dominican binder and filler tobaccos. Perfect construction unveils satisfying medium to full-bodied flavors of toasted cocoa with leather, cedar, dark coffee and sweet spices. Each format offers a succulent finish laced with Avoâ€™s creamy signature.
